name: Feminine Side, Matsuri
ability: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Omiko City》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock & Return this card to your hand] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your other 《Omiko City》 characters, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: Who the hell could've seen this coming?

name: Moment of Everlasting Summer, Lucy
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put the bottom card of your opponent's stock into their waiting room.

【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 level 1 or higher card from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. (Climax are regarded as level 0)

name: Moment of Everlasting Summer, Reo
ability: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more 《Omiko City》 characters, this card gets -1 level while in your hand.

【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of the following effects, and perform it. "Look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room." "You may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room."
【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have another 《Omiko City》 character, this card gets +3000 power until end of turn.

name: Endless Passion for Research, Reo
ability: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your climax phase, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card attacks, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room."

【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 5 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax with [[return.gif]] in its trigger icon revealed among those cards, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: Hehehe. I'm already excited about fixing it.

ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your stock.
【AUTO】 When your other 《Omiko City》 character attacks, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.

【AUTO】 [(1)] When your climax is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, reveal the top card of your deck, choose 1 level X or lower 《Omiko City》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the level of the revealed card. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place)

【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put that character into your opponent's memory.
flavor_text: That room for improvement is what I love most of all, Suzu-san!

name: Replenishing Sugar, Suzu
ability: 【CONT】 If your waiting room has 2 or less climax, this card gets -1 level while in your hand.
【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each other 《Omiko City》 character in your back stage.

【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to X cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. X is equal to the number of 《Omiko City》 characters you have.

name: Secret Art "Gender Swap Awakened"
ability: Choose 1 of the following effects, and perform it.

"[Put 1 ""Tough and Hot-Blooded Boy" Matsuri" from your stage into your waiting room] You may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to 1 "Special Relationship, Matsuri" in your hand, and put it in any position of your stage."
"If you have a 《Omiko City》 character, choose 1 level 2 or higher character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand."
flavor_text: Huh?

name: Memory Shared With You
ability: Search your deck for up to 2 《Omiko City》 characters, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor_text: Right?

ability: 【AUTO】When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the【STANDBY】effect.
(【STANDBY】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character with a level equal to or less than your level +1 in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as【REST】)

ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

ability: 【AUTO】When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the【STANDBY】effect.

name: Special Relationship, Suzu
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 card in your clock, and return it to your hand. If you do, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your clock.

【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, choose up to 1 《Omiko City》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

ability: 【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《Omiko City》, this card gets -1 level and +1500 power while in the stage.

name: Moment of Everlasting Summer, Yayoi
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if there are 6 or less cards in your deck, you may return all cards from your waiting room to your deck. If you do, shuffle your deck.

【AUTO】 【CLOCK】 Alarm If this card is the top card of your clock, and you have 4 or more 《Omiko City》 characters, at the beginning of your climax phase, draw up to 2 cards, choose 2 cards in your hand, and put them into your waiting room.

name: Rampant Desire, Suzu
ability: 【CONT】 This card gets -3 level while in the stage. This card cannot be chosen by your opponent's effects.
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 character in your clock, and put it into your memory.

"Deal 1 damage to your opponent." "You may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room." (Damage may be canceled)
